title: Ticket #4879: fix unit test failure in V8_2-branch for python-bindings classad test
description:
The stable series has the following error in the Batlab for its unit tests. 

  File "tests/classad_tests.py", line 82, in test_list_conversion
    classad.register(listAdd)
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'register'

Ran 28 tests in 0.012s

FAILED (errors=1) 

    Start 8: python_htcondor_test
8/8 Test #8: python_htcondor_test ...................   Passed    0.08 sec

88% tests passed, 1 tests failed out of 8

Total Test time (real) = 7.03 sec

The following tests FAILED: 7 - python_classad_test (Failed) Errors while running CTest Completed task remote_task.run_unit_tests: FAILURE (Exit status: '2048')
remarks:
Assigning to TJ for code review.

2015-Apr-06 13:28:37 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Looks good for the stable release
